title: PortSystemProperties does not set test-ssl-port which causes issues in rest-assured when ports are 0
body:
### Describe the bug

```
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Port must be greater than 0

```

test-port is set by this code, but test-ssl-port is not. Ultimately, this causes the code to return a zero instead of looking up the correct port.

### Expected behavior

Start up with the autogenerated port supplied to resteasy

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

999-SNAPSHOT (latest nightly build)

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
